description: I was part of a project team with two UI/UX designers and two developers building a web application with speech recognition capabilities for a customer. I had to work with all parts of the stack and take responsibility for the whole project.

I have been part of various customer projects doing front-end, back-end, architecture, DevOps and more. I have had the opportunity to grow, learn new technologies and contrubite to various projects during the time I have been part of the team at Intopalo Digital.
I have also received a certificate of appreciation which is given to just few employees annually for their contributions during the last year.
